articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Drill for Ballistic Rocket Fire
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Drill for Ballistic Rocket Fire 
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA) Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, provided field guidance to the drill for ballistic rocket fire of the Hwasong artillery units of the KPA Strategic Force.
					 He, together with General Kim Rak Gyom, commander of the Strategic Force, and other commanding officers, went round the firing sites to learn about the preparations for ballistic rocket firing. After hearing about its plan, he ordered to kick off the drill.
					
					 The drill was conducted by limiting the firing range under the simulated conditions of making preemptive strikes at ports and airfields in the operational theater in south Korea where the U.S. imperialists nuclear war hardware is to be hurled. And it once again examined the operational features of the detonating devices of nuclear warheads mounted on the ballistic rockets at the designated altitude over the target area.
					
					 It fully demonstrated the combat capability of the Hwasong artillery units.
					
					 Kim Jong Un expressed great satisfaction over the successful drill, highly praising the artillerymen for keeping themselves fully ready to carry out any order issued all of a sudden and for being always exact and elaborate both in maneuverability and striking force.
					
					 He assigned the leading officials of the WPK Central Committee, scientists and technicians in the field of research into nuclear weapons and commanding officers of the KPA Strategic Force accompanying him to the tasks of fully ensuring speed and security of the operation of nuclear attack system, rounding off the Juche-based firepower striking methods and developing diverse type ballistic rockets.
					
					 He was accompanied by Ri Man Gon, Ri Pyong Chol, Hong Sung Mu, Kim Jong Sik and other leading officials of the WPK Central Committee and scientists and technicians in the field of research into nuclear weapons.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Message of Greeting to Syrian President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Message of Greeting to Syrian President
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, on Wednesday sent a message of greeting to Bashar Al-Assad, president of the Syrian Arab Republic.
					 The message said:
					
					 I extend warm congratulations to you and, through you, to your friendly government and people on the 50th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and the Syrian Arab Republic.
					
					 The two countries have boosted the ties of friendship and cooperation in the joint struggle for repelling the imperialists' aggression and interference, domination and subjugation and protecting their sovereignty and global peace and security for half a century since the establishment of the diplomatic relations.
					
					 I am convinced that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries provided and developed by the great leaders with much effort will steadily grow strong thanks to our common efforts.
					
					 Availing myself of this opportunity, I sincerely wish you good health and bigger success in your work, extending firm solidarity again to the just struggle of the friendly government and people of the Syrian Arab Republic for beating back the hostile forces' invasion and terrorism and protecting the country's sovereignty and territorial integrity.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Bashar Al-Assad, president of the Syrian Arab Republic, on July 18.
					 The message said:
					
					 On the 50th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the Syrian Arab Republic and the Democratic People's Republic of Korea on July 25, 1966, I extend heartfelt and warmest congratulations to Your Excellency and your friendly people on behalf of the Syrian Arab people and on my own behalf and wish Your Excellency good health and happiness and steady success in your work and your people bigger progress and prosperity.
					
					 Thanks to the common efforts of the leadership of our two countries, the bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation have very satisfactorily developed in various fields since the establishment of official diplomatic relations.
					
					 The upheaval of the international situation and big challenges our two countries have faced over the past 50 years, in particular, have been factors of verifying the solidity of the bilateral relations but our two countries adhering to the common principle have successfully overcome these difficulties, thus further confirming the justice of the struggle against the imperialists' moves for aggression and contributing to achieving global peace.
					
					 On this significant occasion, I once again extend my heartfelt congratulations to Your Excellency and express belief that the bonds of historic friendship existing between our two countries will continue to grow stronger on the principle of mutual respect and equality, cooperation and solidarity among countries which value the protection of interests of the whole mankind.

articles.title: Congratulations to President-Elect of Sao Tome and Principe
articles.content:
Congratulations to President-Elect of Sao Tome and Principe
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a congratulatory message to Evaristo Carvalho, president-elect of the Democratic Republic of Sao Tome and Principe, on Tuesday.
					 The message sincerely wished the president-elect success in his responsible work for the country's socio-economic development and wellbeing of the people of Sao Tome and Principe, expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Spokesman for KPA Panmunjom Mission Urges U.S. Forces in S. Korea to Go Home
articles.content:
Spokesman for KPA Panmunjom Mission Urges U.S. Forces in S. Korea to Go Home
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Panmunjom Mission of the Korean People's Army (KPA) issued a statement on Wednesday, sixty six years since the U.S. usurped the OPECON of the south Korean puppet army.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The so-called "Taejon Agreement" was concluded in July 1950 due to the U.S. wicked design for realizing its military domination over the whole of Korea and the Syngman Rhee traitorous clique's foolish dream about a "north expedition" with its master's backing.
					
					 The agreement was recorded in the history of national division as tragedy and shame in which the U.S. imperialist aggression forces' exercise of the south Korean puppet army's OPECON is guaranteed by "law".
					
					 One of the main reasons why the world points south Korea as the complete U.S. colony and its 51st state is that the former has been subject to humiliation of having transferred the elementary military right to the outsiders over sixty six years, century after century.
					
					 Today when power precisely means justice, nothing is more foolish and miserable to entrust one's destiny to others.
					
					 It is none other than the south Korean puppet army, subsidiary troops which can not act at will even a moment without the approval and permission of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces in south Korea going under the mask of the "UN Forces", and the land of darkness is exactly south Korea as it can make no protest even if it is mercilessly trampled down under the boots and armored vehicles of the brigandish outsiders.
					
					 Whenever the south Korean people turned out in an action against the U.S., the latter left no means untried to maintain the OPECON, main means for its permanent presence in south Korea, at any cost.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists made public without any hesitation their intention to postpone the period of transfer of the OPECON for an indefinite period until the puppet forces provide three conditions: "creation of security climate" on the Korean peninsula, its "attainment of major military capacities" and its "attainment of ability for coping with the north's nuclear weapons and missiles" by instigating the Park Geun Hye group of traitors to stop the controversial issue of transfer of the OPECON from being snow-balled.
					
					 The U.S. is mulling keeping control of the OPECON at any cost even by making a cock-and-bull and impudent excuses which can never work on anyone as it has a sinister scheme which it cannot abandon the OPECON.
					
					 In case the U.S. imperialists transfer the OPECON to the puppet forces, they will lose not only the pretext for staying in south Korea but also the excuse for interfering in the Korean issue.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces are getting more and more dependent on the U.S. with their ambition to stand in confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north and realize their daydream about "unification through absorption" at any cost with the help of their master.
					
					 The dark curtain behind the OPECON is nothing but a clear indictment showing how persistent the U.S. imperialists' hostile policy toward the DPRK and south Korean puppet forces' moves for confrontation with it are and how scandalous the sordid burlesque waged by the master and its stooge to meet their interests is.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces would be well advised to properly face up to the trend of the times.
					
					 The KPA already solemnly declared that the U.S. imperialist aggression forces in south Korea are its first strike target and the puppet traitors following them would also meet the same fate.
					
					 The U.S. should go back home, abandoning its wicked intention for permanent stay in south Korea. This only would be a wise option for evading the coming final ruin even for a moment.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Rejects British Prime Minister's Comment about DPRK's "Nuclear Threat"
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Rejects British Prime Minister's Comment about DPRK's "Nuclear Threat"
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry on Wednesday gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA as regards the British prime minister's comment about the "nuclear threat" from the DPRK:
					 Recently, the British prime minister said her country was exposed to the potential nuclear threat from countries such as Russia and north Korea, ahead of the vote for the plan of building the latest strategic nuclear submarine in the parliament.
					
					 Her remarks are absolutely astonishing.
					
					 It is illogical that the DPRK's nuclear weapons pose a threat to the UK.
					
					 It is a pity that the UK makes an excuse for the building of the nuclear submarine by finding fault with the DPRK thousands kilometers away from it.
					
					 The DPRK and the UK had fought in 1950s for the latter's dispatch of troops to the Korean war but the former does not regard it an enemy as they established diplomatic relations based on mutual respect and equality.
					
					 The DPRK does not regard the UK's nuclear weapons as a threat to it. Therefore, the UK has no need to regard the DPRK's nukes as a threat to it.
					
					 The UK is in need of nuclear weapons for protecting its present and future generations and the DPRK also bolsters up nuclear deterrence to defend itself from the U.S. extreme and potential nuclear war threat.
					
					 The DPRK would continue bolster up its self-defensive nuclear deterrence to protect the sovereignty of the country and vital rights of the nation from the U.S. nuclear threat no matter what may others say.

articles.title: Seventh Congress of GFTUK to Be Convened
articles.content:
Seventh Congress of GFTUK to Be Convened
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The Seventh Congress of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) is to be held here late in October, Juche 105 (2016).
					 It will review the 35-year-long course in which the GFTUK has been strengthened into the mass political organization remaining loyal to the Workers' Party of Korea since the Sixth Congress of the GFTUK and discuss the tasks for its organizations to discharge their mission and role as the organizations for ideological education in the general offensive and charge for implementing the decision made at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Intellectual Product Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
Intellectual Product Exhibition Opens
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- An intellectual product exhibition opened with due ceremony at the Sci-Tech Complex on Wednesday.
					 The exhibition aims at giving impetus to activating the development and trade of the intellectual products including the world-competitive inventions and patent technologies.
					
					 Displayed at the exhibition were more than 450 technical proposals made by the science, research and education units and industrial establishments in the forms of products, models and charts.
					
					 There will take place a lecture, presentation, demonstration lecture, and exchange and sale during the exhibition.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Choe Thae Bok, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission, Jang Chol, president of the State Academy of Sciences, officials concerned, scientists, technicians and inventors.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony, the participants looked round the venue of the exhibition.

articles.title: Contest Held among Technical Innovation Groups in Light Industrial Sector
articles.content:
Contest Held among Technical Innovation Groups in Light Industrial Sector
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- There took place a national technical innovation contest of the April 15 technical innovation groups in the sector of light industry in the DPRK.
					 Participating in it were technical innovation groups from dozens of factories under the Ministry of Light Industry.
					
					 All contesters have achieved many successes in the course of their brisk mass movement for technical innovation after setting goals to step up the drive for putting production processes and management on a modern and IT basis, keep production going at a high rate and increase the proportion of locally produced equipment, raw and other materials.
					
					 The groups have contrived and introduced at least 500 valuable proposals for technical innovations during the contest, locally produced hundreds of varieties of equipment parts and 130 odd kinds of raw and other materials, making a great contribution to the production of consumer goods. .
					
					 The groups of the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill, Phyongsong Synthetic Leather Factory came first in the contest.
					
					 A meeting took place at the leather factory to sum up the contest.
					
					 Officials concerned and exemplary members of the groups took part in it.

articles.title: National Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Works Held
articles.content:
National Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Works Held
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- A national seminar took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Wednesday to deeply grasp and glorify the validity and vitality of the ideas and theories set forth at leader Kim Jong Il's works "On Some Problems of Education in the Juche Idea" and "The Juche Philosophy Is an Original Revolutionary Philosophy". 
					 It heard five papers explaining and proving the originality and validity of the Juche-based philosophical ideas and theories clarified by him in his works.
					
					 The speakers said that he explored a new path of the development of human philosophy with his rare wisdom and philosophical thinking.
					
					 In his works he originally indicated the purpose and scientific ways of studying philosophy, placing the popular masses in the center of everything, they noted.
					
					 They proved the grounds that his works serve as guidelines for explaining and developing the Juche philosophy as an original one.
					
					 They dealt with the feats he performed by turning the Juche philosophy into the revolutionary and political one both in name and reality and increasing its attraction in every way.
					
					 Only when a strong wind of ideological campaign is raised to model the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism under the uplifted banner of the Juche-oriented theory of ideology, will the people's beautiful dreams and ideal will become shining realities on this land, they stressed.
					
					 Present there were officials of party and administrative bodies, working people's organizations and those in the fields of science, education, literature and arts and media, the field for the preservation of revolutionary sites and party officials training institutions at national levels and of Pyongyang City.

articles.title: State Academic Degrees and Titles Conferred on Intellectuals
articles.content:
State Academic Degrees and Titles Conferred on Intellectuals
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- State academic degrees and titles were conferred on intellectuals, who made positive contributions to the scientific and technical development of the country, the building of an economic giant and the improvement of the people's standard of living.
					 Un Jong Sop, researcher of Kim Il Sung University, etc. were awarded the title of academician and Ju Song Un, researcher of the Academy of Medical Science, the title of candidate academician.
					
					 Professorship went to Son Yong Chol, head of a department of Kim Il Sung University, Jo Song Chol, researcher of Pyongyang Engineering University, Ham Sang Ho, head of an office of the Coal Branch of the State Academy of Sciences, etc.
					
					 Doctorate was conferred on Ryang Se Hun, deputy rector of Kim Il Sung Higher Party School, Hwang Hwa Ryong, academic adviser to the school, Jang Won Il, head of a department of Kim Il Sung University, Kim Mun Gi, head of a department of Kim Chaek University of Technology, etc., and titles of associate professor on 108 persons and master's degrees on 802 persons.
					
					 An awarding ceremony took place on Wednesday.

articles.title: Trade Union Officials, Information Workers Start Study Tour of Revolutionary Battle Sites in Area of Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
Trade Union Officials, Information Workers Start Study Tour of Revolutionary Battle Sites in Area of Mt. Paektu
 Hyesan, July 20 (KCNA) -- Officials of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) and primary information workers started the study tour of revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu on the 63rd anniversary of the great victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 A kick-off meeting was held before the Monument to the Victorious Battle of Pochonbo on Wednesday.
					
					 The participants laid bouquets before the statue of President Kim Il Sung at the monument and paid tribute to him.
					
					 A reporter and speakers said that the revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu are eternal treasures which cannot be bartered for anything as the Songun revolution started there and the Korean revolution struck its roots.
					
					 The battle sites associated with the revolutionary history and exploits of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu reflect the intention of the Workers' Party of Korea to achieve a final victory of the cause of the Juche revolution at any cost, they noted, adding:
					
					 All members of the study group should deeply grasp the greatness of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu and the history of the Songun revolution and thoroughly arm themselves with the revolutionary tradition of Paektu, eternal bedrock of the Korean revolution.
					
					 At the end of the meeting, they went round the monument and visited the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery in Hyesan.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Meet
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Meet
 Nampho, July 20 (KCNA) -- Foreign crewmen met at Nampho Port on Wednesday on the 63rd anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Attending it were captains and crew of the Togo-flagged ship RICH HONOR and Panama-flagged ship ZHONGYU 57.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Nampho City and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Speakers said the great victory won by the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War was an event which put an end to the myth of the U.S. imperialists' "mightiness" and brought about the beginning of a downhill turn for them.
					
					 They highly praised Kim Il Sung, who beat back the U.S. imperialists that boasted of being the "strongest" in the world for the first time in history, as the outstanding strategist and invincible iron-willed commander revered by progressive mankind.
					
					 The war victory exploits are being glorified thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un, they stressed.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Second-Phase Project for Reconstructing Promenade Completed
articles.content:
Second-Phase Project for Reconstructing Promenade Completed
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The second-phase project for reconstructing the promenade along the River Taedong has been successfully completed in Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK.
					 A section between Okryu and Rungna bridges was newly paved and railed off with well-cut granites from the river.
					
					 Thousands of trees of good species were transplanted and over 60 thousand square meters of lawn created.
					
					 Choe Jong Ho, vice-chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee, told KCNA that the project could be finished ahead of schedule thanks to the patriotic enthusiasm displayed by working citizens and officials of ministries and national institutions to spruce up the city.
					
					 It is gaining momentum in the DPRK to protect revetments and green their surrounding areas.

articles.title: Broad-gauge Railway Project Progresses Apace in DPRK
articles.content:
Broad-gauge Railway Project Progresses Apace in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The construction of Hyesan-Samjiyon broad-gauge railway has been rapidly carried out in the northern mountainous area of the DPRK. Its first-stage project is now in progress at over 70 percent.
					 The builders succeeded in blasting 25 million ton earth and completed railroad beds.
					
					 Successes have also been witnessed in extending and coating a railway tunnel, the longest one in the section.
					
					 Meanwhile, measures have been taken to prevent flood damage during the rainy season.

articles.title: "Green Insam" under Cultivation in DPRK
articles.content:
"Green Insam" under Cultivation in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- "Green insam (Abelmoschus Esculentus Moench)" is under cultivation in the DPRK.
					 In Pyongyang City alone, it has been cultivated in several hundred hectares.
					
					 So Ung Nam, a researcher of the Academy of Agricultural Science, told KCNA that "green insam" is an annual herbaceous plant rich in protein.
					
					 The productivity of newly-bred one is 1.5 times higher than existing one, he said, adding:
					
					 Its green fruit and seed are edible for their high nutritive value.
					
					 The oil content of seed reaches nearly 20 percent. "Green insam" abounds in protein, vitamins and carbohydrate, as compared with other vegetables.
					
					 Regular intake of "green insam" takes almost the same efficacy as insam.

articles.title: Renovated Cornstarch Factory in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Renovated Cornstarch Factory in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Cornstarch Factory in the DPRK has undergone a radical change to be a model of the country's foodstuff processing industry.
					 All its production processes, from raw material feeding to packing, are equipped with home-made hi-tech facilities.
					
					 The factory established advanced processes for extracting sugar from locally cultivated corn, while producing millet jelly and corn sugar in a biological way by culturing various kinds of active enzymes.
					
					 It also has a process of producing oil and feed with by-product from corn processing.
					
					 When visiting this factory in June last, supreme leader Kim Jong Un praised it as a factory advancing under the banner of Juche-orientation and a model in displaying the spirit of self-reliance and self-development.
					
					 The factory came to being on September 24, Juche 34 (1945).

articles.title: Ruin of S. Korean Conservative Group Near at Hand: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Ruin of S. Korean Conservative Group Near at Hand: Rodong Sinmun 
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The traitorous nature of the "Saenuri Party" of south Korea, reactionary forces of history, can never be covered up, an article of Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says, and goes on:
					 The south Korean people in the "National Assembly" election in April severely punished the "Saenuri Party", group of sycophantic traitors, fascist dictators, anti-reunification elements, and the den of all injustice and evils.
					
					 The defeat of the "Saenuri Party" in the election was a decisive option of the south Korean people to finally beat back the old and corrupt political forces and a stern judgment of history.
					
					 However, the group of the "Saenuri Party" is running amuck to tide over the crisis and realize the ambition for staying in power, challenging the judgment by mindset of the people.
					
					 Typical examples are the act of the traitorous group coaxing the angry people while busying itself with inaugurating an emergency measure committee for renovation and talking about "abolishing factional forces."
					
					 But, such third-rate plots can never help it cover up its despicable and dirty character and ugly nature as a group of reactionaries of history.
					
					 The "Saenuri Party" was the group of unpardonable traitors which was founded on the base of sycophancy toward the U.S. and dependence on outsiders, the group of vicious anti-reunification traitors running amuck with confrontation with the north and the group of rare fascists trampling down progress and democracy of south Korean society and political freedom and rights of south Koreans through dictatorship, oppression and unpopular rule.
					
					 Now the "Saenuri Party" group is making desperate efforts to get out of the ruinous pit. However, the vigorous massive struggle of the south Korean people from all walks of life against the regime is shaking down to the roots the ruling groundwork of the group of traitors.
					
					 The reality goes to eloquently prove that the ruin of the puppet conservative group is near at hand.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Ridicules U.S. Ambassador to South Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Ridicules U.S. Ambassador to South Korea 
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The U.S. ambassador to south Korea took a F-16 to fly the sky over south Korea for about one hour allegedly to encourage the U.S. forces present in south Korea and the puppet forces.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 One can see that those who fabricated the burlesque put much effort into it to maximize its effect.
					
					 Though the U.S. ambassador took the fighter and made a display of his authority, he can never turn the table on the U.S. side again. This will only clearly disclose his criminal nature as a chief criminal pushing the tension on the Korean peninsula to an extreme phase.
					
					 As a warmonger he once said "we will get ready to fight against the north even tonight".
					
					 He is steeped in the Yankee-style way of thinking to the marrow of his bones that one does not care about bleeding other countries and nations white and making the whole of humankind slaves in a bid to attain one's ambition for aggression. He is a scout for aggression in a fine suit before being a diplomat.
					
					 He, who had made a fool of himself, boarded the fighter, the stage of burlesque, to play a main role, being lost to shame. This cannot but be an act of a crazy guy obsessed with aggression and war.
					
					 The hysteric action of the rogue wearing a tie omens the miserable tomorrow of the U.S., a tiger moth that will perish in flames of justice.

articles.title: Minju Joson Accuses U.S. of Escalating Tensions in Northeast Asia
articles.content:
Minju Joson Accuses U.S. of Escalating Tensions in Northeast Asia
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The deployment of THAAD in south Korea decided by the U.S. at a time when it is bringing its strategic assets one after another to Northeast Asia is a risky and reckless military move driving the regional situation into an uncontrollable catastrophe, says Minju Joson Wednesday in a commentary.
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The U.S. has raised the DPRK's "military threat' and "nuclear and missile threat" as a justification for its policy of arms buildup but this is just a sheer lie.
					
					 Now that the U.S. is resorting to a grave military adventure to destroy and neutralize the strategic force of the DPRK after pinpointing it as a primary target, it can never remain a passive onlooker to it.
					
					 Massive nuclear strike means have already been introduced into the Korean peninsula and its vicinity.
					
					 There is no doubt that these forces will be hurled into Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drills to be soon launched by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces to get familiar with the operation for a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK.
					
					 Under the prevailing grave situation that dark clouds of a nuclear war are being brought to the Korean peninsula, the DPRK cannot but take tough physical countermeasures to defend the sovereignty, dignity and peace of the country.
					
					 If the U.S. finally ignites a nuclear war against the Korean nation despite the repeated warnings served by the DPRK, the DPRK will surely push the aggressors and provokers into a grave of doom by mounting the most merciless and bitterest preemptive nuclear strike on them.

articles.title: S. Koreans Demand Retraction of THAAD Deployment Decision
articles.content:
S. Koreans Demand Retraction of THAAD Deployment Decision
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The "National Measure Council for Opposing the Deployment of THAAD" in south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on Monday demanding the retraction of the THAAD deployment decision, according to the south Korean paper Nodong and Segye.
					 At the conference the speakers blamed Park Geun Hye for provoking the residents of Songju County by crying out for ending unnecessary dispute over THAAD and suppressing their protest against its deployment.
					
					 If THAAD is deployed, south Korea will turn into an outpost for defending the U.S. and Japan, they noted.
					
					 Deploring that the burden of upkeep of U.S. forces to be shouldered by south Korea will also snowball, they urged the "National Assembly" to proactively work for getting the decision retracted.

articles.title: S. Korean Police to Harshly Suppress No-THAAD Campaign
articles.content:
S. Korean Police to Harshly Suppress No-THAAD Campaign
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The south Korean fascist police is busy suppressing the residents of Songju County, North Kyongsang Province who are out in protest against THAAD deployment.
					 When the south Korean puppet prime minister and minister of Defense appeared in the county to hold a briefing for justifying the THAAD deployment on July 15, angry residents staged fierce protests in token of their indignation.
					
					 The puppet North Kyongsang Provincial Police Agency, terming the protests "interference in the execution of official duties" and "violence", organized an exclusive investigation group and is set to find out what it called wire-pullers, talking about "interference by outsiders."
					
					 It is going to punish the residents who blocked with tractors and trucks the way of the visiting rulers and their party that took to flight after being pelted with water bottles and eggs while reeling off a string of treacherous invectives.
					
					 This is just a revelation of the base intrigue of the south Korean authorities to maintain their unpopular rule for sycophancy toward the U.S. by snubbing the daily-mounting desire of south Korean people for independence against the U.S.

articles.title: Koreans in U.S. Voice Objection to THAAD Deployment in S. Korea
articles.content:
Koreans in U.S. Voice Objection to THAAD Deployment in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- Koreans in the U.S. are launching strong actions in protest against the deployment of THAAD in south Korea decided by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime which will threaten peace and escalate military tensions on the Korean peninsula.
					 They staged a demo in front of the White House in Washington D.C. in protest against the THAAD deployment in south Korea.
					
					 Demonstrators disclosed the injustice and danger of the deployment of THAAD which will threaten peace and exterminate the Korean nation, handing out leaflets to Americans.
					
					 A similar demo was staged in front of the White House on July 17.
					
					 Demonstrators asserted that as the decision of THAAD deployment was made by the south Korean regime in disregard of the security and vital rights of south Koreans, their actions against it are just.
					
					 The Korean Americans' Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy released a statement titled "Prelude to war, immediate halt to THAAD deployment!" on July 15.
					
					 Meanwhile, Koreans in U.S. started a No-THAAD signature campaign involving 100,000 people on July 15.
					
					 It was participated in by at least 4,000 people as of July 17.

articles.title: S. Koreans to Launch Large-scale Campaign against THAAD Deployment
articles.content:
S. Koreans to Launch Large-scale Campaign against THAAD Deployment
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- Residents of Songju County, North Kyongsang Province of south Korea reformed the all-county residents emergency measure committee for opposing deployment of THAAD in Songju into the committee for campaign against THAAD deployment in Songju and voiced their stand to carry on their struggle on July 16, according to Newsis of south Korea.
					 The campaign committee declared that it will not only continue demos and rallies but also launch legal actions to shed light on the illegality of THAAD deployment.
					
					 We will urge the county head to exit the "Saenuri Party" and stage a large-scale protest rally in Seoul on Thursday, it added.

articles.title: Nigerian Newspaper Praises Kim Jong Un's Mode of Creation
articles.content:
Nigerian Newspaper Praises Kim Jong Un's Mode of Creation
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- Nigerian Observer, the Nigerian newspaper, on July 8 carried an article titled "Kim Jong Un's mode of creation".
					 Saying that the DPRK taking on more wonderful looks on a daily basis is drawing the attention of the international community, the article went on:
					
					 Then, what is HE Kim Jong Un's mode of creation, who is leading the building of a powerful socialist country?
					
					 Firstly, it is to exceed the world level.
					
					 HE Kim Jong Un creates everything in a fresh, innovative and enterprising manner.
					
					 Secondly, it is incredible speed of creation.
					
					 The Korean army and people startled the world by finishing the building of the Masikryong Ski Resort in a short period under his leadership, which would take others more than 10 years to finish.
					
					 Thirdly, it's big way and immensity.
					
					 It is HE Kim Jong Un's principle of creation to make every edifice monumental and ever-lasting.
					
					 He set forth a new line of simultaneously pushing forward the two fronts in the era of Songun and once again demonstrated the country's prestige and dignity as a nuclear power.
					
					 The DPRK holding him at the top post will emerge as a powerful socialist country before long.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Election as Chairman of State Affairs Commission Hailed in Angola
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Election as Chairman of State Affairs Commission Hailed in Angola
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Angola on July 14 to hail the election of Marshal Kim Jong Un as chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK.
					 An assemblyman said Kim Jong Un's election as chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK represents the firm faith and will of all the Korean people to accomplish the cause of the Juche revolution without fail, which was pioneered by President Kim Il Sung and advanced by leader Kim Jong Il, under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 No force can hold back the advance of the Koreans hastening the building of a thriving nation, united close around Kim Jong Un, he added.
					
					 The deputy general director of a company noted his election as chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK was a great pleasure of not only the Koreans but also progressive mankind. The world attention is focused on the DPRK which stands firm in the spirit of self-reliance and self-development in the face of the ever-increasing moves of the hostile forces to stifle it, he said.
					
					 The Korean people are sure to the final victory under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, he noted, extending full support and solidarity to the just cause of the Korean people.

articles.title: S. Korean People's Struggle against THAAD Deployment Reported in China
articles.content:
S. Korean People's Struggle against THAAD Deployment Reported in China
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- China media on July 15 reported the struggle of the inhabitants of Songju County, North Kyongsang Province of south Korea against the U.S. and the puppet authorities' unilateral decision on the deployment of THAAD as breaking news.
					 The media said that the south Korean authorities including the "prime minister" visited the inhabitants of the county only to face strong protest by them after the authorities chose the county as the site for THAAD deployment.
					
					 The inhabitants of the county pelted the "prime minister" with eggs and water bottles, chanting such slogans as "We protest against THAAD deployment at the risk of our lives", the media noted, adding:
					
					 When the visitors tried to leave, the inhabitants encircled them and a man drove a tractor to block them.

articles.title: Solidarity Meeting with Koreans Held in Austria
articles.content:
Solidarity Meeting with Koreans Held in Austria
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- A lecture and film show took place by the Youth Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in Austria on July 15 in the month for solidarity with the Korean people.
					 The chief of the group and other participants said that under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung the service personnel and people of the DPRK prevailed over the U.S. imperialists that boasted of being the "strongest" in the world and their followers to honorably defend the sovereignty and dignity of the country.
					
					 Terming the U.S. the provoker of the Korean war and arch criminal of dividing Korea into the north and the south, they noted that the U.S. imperialists and their followers are getting hell-bent on their moves to launch a new war, oblivious of their bitter lesson.
					
					 The Korean People's Army has developed into the most elite powerful army equipped with modern offensive and defensive means capable of smashing any aggressors at one stroke under the Songun revolutionary leadership of the great HE Kim Jong Un, they stressed.
					
					 They expressed belief that thanks to him the Korean people would build a prosperous reunified state without fail.
					
					 The participants watched Korean film "Order No. 027."

articles.title: UK Organization Slams S. Korean Puppet Warmongers' Moves to Ignite War
articles.content:
UK Organization Slams S. Korean Puppet Warmongers' Moves to Ignite War
 Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted on its website an article titled "Korean peninsula on eve of war" in denunciation of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers' moves to ignite a war. 
					 The article said:
					
					 The situation on the peninsula is inching close to the brink of a war with each passing moment, owing to the frantic war drills against the north waged by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers and their reckless confrontation moves.
					
					 In June, the U.S. introduced nuclear-powered submarine Mississippi into Pusan Port of south Korea and let the formation of B-52H strategic bombers on Guam fly to south Korea, getting frantic in the drill to drop nuclear bombs. 
					
					 The south Korean warmongers mobilized tens of warships including Aegis destroyer and more than 10 fighters and staged such powder-reeking drills as anti-air and anti-ship shooting drill while talking about someone's "provocation of a local war along the northern limit line".
					
					 Though the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers have steadily resorted to the reckless military provocation, they would meet only death.
					
					 The withdrawal of the U.S. forces is a sine qua non requirement for peace and reunification on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean warmongers should behave with discretion in conformity with public opinion at home and abroad aspiring after the peace and security on the peninsula and the demand of the era.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige ejercicio de lanzamiento de cohetes balisticos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige ejercicio de lanzamiento de cohetes balisticos
Pyongyang, 20 de julio (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno el ejercicio de lanzamiento de cohetes balisticos de las unidades artilleras Hwasong de las fuerzas estrategicas del EPC.
					El Comandante Supremo se cercioro de los preparativos de entrenamiento y escucho el plan de lanzamiento recorriendo los campos de lanzamiento en compania del general de ejercito Kim Rak Gyom, comandante de las fuerzas estrategicas, y otros miembros de mando y dio la orden de iniciar el ejercicio.
					
					El entrenamiento tuvo lugar con el alcance limitado suponiendo el ataque preventivo a los puertos y aeropuertos en el teatro operacional del Sur de Corea donde se introduciran los equipos de guerra nuclear de Estados Unidos.
					
					Tambien, comprobo una vez mas las especificaciones de funcionamiento del aparato de control de explosion de la ojiva nuclear, instalada en el cohete balistico, en la altura definida de la zona tomada como blanco.
					
					En esta ocasion se ha demostrado plenamente la combatividad de las unidades artilleras Hwasong de las fuerzas estrategicas del EPC.
					
					Muy satisfecho por la marcha exitosa del entrenamiento, Kim Jong Un evaluo que los artilleros Hwasong estan bien preparados a cualquier orden sorpresiva y son siempre precisos y minuciosos tanto en la movilidad como en la intensidad de ataque.
					
					Presento a los cuadros directivos del Comite Central del PTC, los cientificos y tecnicos de la rama de investigacion de armas nucleares y los miembros de mando de las fuerzas estrategicas del EPC, quienes le acompanaban en la ocasion, las tareas para garantizar perfectamente la rapidez y la seguridad del funcionamiento del sistema de ataque nuclear, perfeccionar los autoctonos metodos de fuego artillero y desarrollar cohetes balisticos de diversos tipos.
					
					El fue acompanado por Ri Man Gon, Ri Pyong Chol, Hong Sung Mu, Kim Jong Sik y otros cuadros directivos del CC del PTC y los cientificos y tecnicos de la rama de investigacion de armas nucleares.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a Bashar al-Assad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a Bashar al-Assad
Pyongyang, 20 de julio (ACNC) -- El Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea,  Kim Jong Un, remitio hoy un mensaje de felicitacion al Presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria, Bashar al-Assad.
					La misiva sigue:
					
					Con motivo del 50o aniversario del establecimiento de las relaciones diplomaticas entre la RPDC y la Republica Arabe de Siria, envio cordiales felicitaciones a Vd., y por su conducto, al amistoso gobierno y pueblo de su pais. 
					
					Durante 50 anos despues del establecimiento de relaciones diplomaticas, nuestros dos paises vinieron consolidando y desarrollando los lazos de amistad y cooperacion en la lucha conjunta contra la agresion y la intervencion, la dominacion y la subyugacion de los imperialistas y por la defensa de la soberania del pais y la paz y seguridad del mundo. 
					
					Estoy convencido de que las excelentes relaciones de amistad y cooperacion existentes entre nuestros dos paises, preparadas y forjadas por los grandes Lideres con mucho esfuerzo, seguiran ampliandose y desarrollandose en el futuro tambien gracias a nuestros esfuerzos conjuntos. 
					
					Aprovecho esta oportunidad para expresar una vez mas la firme solidaridad con la lucha justa del gobierno y el pueblo de la amistosa Republica Arabe de Siria por preservar la soberania y la integridad territorial del pais rechazando la agresion y el terrorismo de las fuerzas hostiles. Deseo de todo corazon buena salud a Vd. y mayores exitos en sus responsabilidades.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Bashar al-Assad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Bashar al-Assad
Pyongyang, 20 de julio (ACNC) -- El Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Jong Un, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el dia 18 el Presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria, Bashar al-Assad. 
					El texto sigue:
					
					Con motivo del 50o aniversario del establecimiento de relaciones diplomaticas entre la Republica Arabe de Siria y la RPDC en el 25 de julio de 1966, extiendo con toda sinceridad las mas cordiales felicitaciones a Su Excelencia y al amistoso pueblo de su pais en nombre del pueblo arabe sirio y en el mio propio y deseo buena salud y felicidad a Su Excelencia y continuos exitos en sus responsabilidades y mayor progreso y prosperidad al pueblo coreano. 
					
					Desde que se han establecido las oficiales relaciones diplomaticas gracias a los esfuerzos conjuntos de las Direcciones de ambos paises, las relaciones bilaterales de amistad y cooperacion vinieron desarrollandose satisfactoriamente en varios sectores. 
					
					En particular, los cambios de la situacion mundial y grandes desafios, que sufrieron nuestros dos paises durante 50 anos pasados, sirvieron de elementos comprobantes de la solidez de las relaciones de nuestros dos paises. Al superar con exito esas dificultades, nuestros dos paises, que mantienen los principios comunes, confirmaron mas la justeza de la lucha contra las maniobras agresivas de los imperialistas contribuyendo a la paz mundial. 
					
					En esta oportunidad significativa, vuelvo a enviar sinceras felicitaciones a Vd., convencido de que los historicos lazos de amistad existentes entre nuestros dos paises se consolidaran continuamente de acuerdo con los principios de cooperacion y solidaridad entre los paises que conceden importancia al respeto mutuo e igualdad y a la defensa de los intereses de la toda la humanidad.

articles.title: Representacion del EPC en Phanmunjom urge a EE.UU. desistir de su intento de ocupacion perpetua del Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Representacion del EPC en Phanmunjom urge a EE.UU. desistir de su intento de ocupacion perpetua del Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 20 de julio (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que se cumplen 66 anos desde cuando EE.UU. arrebato el mando de operaciones en el tiempo de guerra al ejercito titere surcoreano, el portavoz de la Representacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea en Phanmunjom hizo publica el dia 20 una declaracion. 
					Segun el documento, en julio de 1950, quedo firmado el llamado "convenio de Taejon" como producto de la coincidencia de la astuta intencion de EE.UU. de tomar el control militar sobre toda Corea con la necia ambicion de la banda traidora surcoreana de Syngman Rhee de iniciar el "avance hacia el Norte" con la ayuda de su amo gringo. 
					
					Este "convenio" fue registrado en la historia de division de la nacion coreana como una tragedia y verguenza que garantizo "legalmente" el pase del mando de operaciones del ejercito surcoreano para el tiempo de guerra a las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea, critica el texto y prosigue: 
					
					Hoy dia, el mundo estima al Sur de Corea como colonia completa y 51o Estado de EE.UU. porque a lo largo de 66 anos, confia hasta la autoridad militar a las fuerzas extranjeras. 
					
					En el mundo actual donde la fuerza constituye la justicia, no habra otra cosa mas absurda y desgraciada que sujetar la vida a otros.
					
					El ejercito surcoreano es el mercenario que no puede moverse ni un momento sin la aprobacion o autorizacion de las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea, disfrazadas de "fuerzas de la ONU". Y el Sur de Corea es la tierra obscura donde los habitantes no pueden decir ni una palabra de protesta aunque fueran atropellados por las botas militares de los gangsteres norteamericanos y las orugas de sus coches blindados. 
					
					Cada vez que la poblacion surcoreana libraba con vehemente indignacion la lucha antiyanqui, EE.UU. hizo todo lo posible para mantener a toda costa el mando de operaciones para el tiempo de guerra, medio principal para la ocupacion perpetua del suelo surcoreano. 
					
					Para hacer consumado este tema que sigue siendo polemica, EE.UU. instigo a la camarilla traidora surcoreana de Park Geun-hye a anunciar sin escrupulos que el periodo de traslado del mando se pospondra por tiempo indefinido hasta que se dieran estas tres condiciones: la creacion del ambiente de seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana, la disposicion de la capacidad militar medular del ejercito titere surcoreano y el aumento de capacidad de hacer frente a las armas nucleares y misiles norcoreanos.
					
					EE.UU. esta empenado en mantener el mando presentando pretextos absurdos y descarados porque tiene un intento irrenunciable.
					
					En el caso de trasladarlo a los titeres surcoreanos, perdera la justificacion de mantener su presencia militar en el Sur de Corea e intervenir en el problema coreano. 
					
					Por su parte, los titeres surcoreanos obedecen con mas bajeza a EE.UU. con la vana ilusion de enfrentarse con la parte connacional y lograr la "unificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes" con la ayuda de su amo. 
					
					Lo que acontece en silencio en torno al mando de operaciones para el tiempo de guerra testimonia que son muy obstinadas la politica norteamericana de hostilidad a la RPDC y la campana de enfrentamiento fratricida de los titeres surcoreanos y es ridicula la farsa del amo y lacayo para satisfacer los intereses propios. 
					
					Los imperialistas norteamericanos y los titeres surcoreanos deben ver correctamente la tendencia de la epoca. 
					
					El EPC ya ha anunciado con seriedad que toma por su primer blanco de ataque a las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea y tendran el mismo destino los traidores surcoreanos. 
					
					EE.UU. debe desistir de su siniestro intento de perpetuar la ocupacion del suelo surcoreano y retirar a casa a sus tropas ocupantes. Esto seria la opcion sensata para eludir el inminente arruinamiento final.

articles.title: Se convocara VII Congreso de Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea
articles.content:
Se convocara VII Congreso de Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea
Pyongyang, 20 de julio (ACNC) -- Tendra lugar en esta capital en la segunda mitad de octubre del 105(2016) de la Era Juche el VII Congreso de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea (FGSC).
					El conclave balanceara la trayectoria de 35 anos de desarrollo de la FGSC posteriores a la celebracion del VI Congreso, periodo en que ha venido fortaleciendose mas como organizacion politica masiva fiel a la causa del Partido, y debatira las tareas de las organizaciones de la FGSC para cumplir con su mision y papel como entidad de educacion ideologica en la ofensiva general para materializar la resolucion del VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
